summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley dated January 22, 2010. The email indicates a request for assistance from Staley and contains a confidentiality notice suggesting the communication may be privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a need for assistance from Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, who is reaching out to Epstein for help.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are communicating directly, indicating a relationship where Epstein is being asked for assistance.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein is seeking assistance from Jes Staley.
The email contains a confidentiality notice indicating it may be attorney-client privileged.
